# samsungcloudplatform_config_inspection_diagnosis_request (Data Source)

Request Config Inspection Diagnosis

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "samsungcloudplatform_config_inspection_diagnosis_request" "my_diag_request" {
  project_id           = "PROJECT-XXXXXXXXXX"
  access_key           = ""
  diagnosis_check_type = "BP"
  diagnosis_id         = "DIA-XXXXXXXXXX"
}

output "output_config_inspection_diagnosis_request" {
  value = data.samsungcloudplatform_config_inspection_diagnosis_request.my_diag_request.result
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `access_key` (String) Access Key
- `diagnosis_check_type` (String) Diagnosis Check Type (either 'BP' or 'SSI')
- `diagnosis_id` (String) Diagnosis ID (obtained through Config Inspection List)
- `project_id` (String) Project ID

### Optional

- `secret_key` (String) Secret Key (optional)
- `tenant_id` (String) Tenant ID (Azure, optional)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `result` (Boolean) Result of the diagnosis request
